attributes.action: As Britain is a democracy and 59% of the population are Christians, The laws of the land should reflect the standards of God.
attributes.additional_details:
The government are gradually changing the laws of the land. Unfortunately these new laws are not based upon the laws of God, as British law has been for centuries.
Being that this country is a democracy and according to the 2011 census, over 59% of the population are Christian, we request the government listen to the majority and keep gods standards as the basis of the law.
